languages.text: {n}Мучительное выражение в глазах Маражая исчезает — на смену ему приходит давно знакомая вам злорадная решимость.{/n} "Предложение принято, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай издает взбешенный вой.{/n} "Хватит с меня! Я не добыча проклятых ведьм — я ваш палач!"
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Мучительное выражение в глазах Маражая исчезает — на смену ему приходит давно знакомая вам злорадная решимость.{/n} "Предложение принято, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a frenzied howl.{/n} "I've had enough! I am no damned Wych's trophy — I am your executioner!"
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Le regard tourmenté de Marazhai laisse place à la détermination malveillante qui vous est devenue familière.{/n} « J'accepte votre offre, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un hurlement sauvage.{/n} « Ça suffit ! Je ne suis pas un vulgaire trophée des Cérastes ! Je suis votre bourreau ! »
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眼中痛苦的表情消失了，取而代之的是恶毒与决绝，你已经熟悉了他这样的神情。{/n}“我接受你的提议，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了狂怒的嚎叫。{/n}“我受够了！我才不是那群该死巫灵的战利品！我是你们的刽子手！”
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの目にあった苦悩の表情は消え去り、あなたが知っている邪悪な決意に取って代わる。{/n}「お前の申し出を受けよう、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの目にあった苦悩の表情は消え去り、あなたが知っている邪悪な決意に取って代わる。{/n}「お前の申し出を受けよう、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Der gequälte Ausdruck in Marazhais Augen verschwindet ... und weicht der grausamen Entschlossenheit, die du bereits kennst.{/n} "Angebot akzeptiert, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai reagiert mit einem wütenden Heulen.{/n} "Mir reicht es! Ich bin keine verdammte Hekatari-Trophäe – ich bin Euer Henker!"
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}La expresión atormentada desaparece de los ojos de Marazhai, reemplazada por la resolución maligna que ya te es familiar.{/n} «Tu oferta queda aceptada, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai profiere un salvaje aullido.{/n} «¡Ya he tenido suficiente! ¡No soy un maldito trofeo para las brujas; soy vuestro verdugo!».
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözlerindeki acılı ifade hiçliğe karışıyor, aşinalık kazandığın kindar kararlılığa yerini bırakıyor.{/n} "Teklifini kabul ediyorum mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}The tormented expression in Marazhai's eyes vanishes — to be replaced with the malevolent resolve you have come to know.{/n} "Your offer is accepted, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözlerindeki acılı ifade hiçliğe karışıyor, aşinalık kazandığın kindar kararlılığa yerini bırakıyor.{/n} "Teklifini kabul ediyorum mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai
